name.text:
Zoster: Patient is overdue at 62 years of age for Zoster dose 
Evaluation_Test_Type: No Doses Administered
General_Description: This test case describes when a patient is 62 years of age and has not been administered a Zoster vaccine, that dose 1 (Shingrix) of the 2 dose series should be forecasted.

recommendation.description:
Evaluation_Test_Type: No Doses Administered
Forecast_Test_Type: EvaluationRecommended based on age
General_Description: This test case describes when a patient is 62 years of age and has not been administered a Zoster vaccine, that dose 1 (Shingrix) of the 2 dose series should be forecasted.
